page.title: 04Cub Scout Pack
page.content: Beaver Lodge is the headquarters of the 1st Royal Forest scout group, and it is here that the 1st Royal Forest cub scout pack have met for the past 30 years.In 1985 the pack under the leadership of Mrs Christine Thomas (Cub Scout Leader) and Cath Preece (Assistant Cub Scout Leader) have enjoyed a weekend District Camp at St Briavels,taken part in a 5 a_side football match at Newent, and attended a badge day at Beaver Lodge where Cubs worked for this year and Map Reader badge.Also planned for this year is an outing to the fleet air arm museum at Yeovilton and the district swimming Gala.At present there are 24 boys in the pack. A boy can join at 8 years old and moves on to scouts at 10\ years.This year cub parents have been busy carrying out improvements to beaver lodge.
